name: Archgnomedes
description:
Description

Archgnomedes is a First-Person puzzle shooter where the player will battle over-sized and over whelming enemies with the use of a shrink-ray. 

Credits Programmers

Tarn Cooper      Peter Jadric

Artists

Erin Biskup      Grace Callaway      Thomas Amann

Designers

Gavin Lee      Mateusz Solle     Rowan Brown
